name: In God We Must 2012
description:
Today we find our country at a very critical intersection. The decisions we make now will forever change our future. 

As we look back at our nation's founders and the institutions put in place to form these United States, we clearly see a humbling and focus towards God. Clearly understanding our nations commitment to God and recognizing His hand in our blessings over the past 200 plus years is essential when contemplating our future and our next move as Americans.

For this reason we have created a bumper sticker. It's not what most would consider to be a contribution of mass proportion, but it's message "IN GOD WE MUST 2012" is strong, yet simple. It is a reminder to all of us that our very right to vote and sway the direction of this great country is our God given responsibility. 

The bumper sticker measures 3" x 11 1/2" in size.
